en: I see our conversation last month hasn't stuck with you, huh?
You only seem to do better when I'm watching you. But you're an adult. I shouldn't have to make you do your job on time!
none::Roger's been getting on your case even more than usual lately. You're sure he knows what you're up to, and you won't need this job much longer. How do you respond?
Oh, ho! You have a mouth on you now, too!
I'm docking your pay - you're costing the company money and setting a bad example for everyone here.
Think before you speak next time, all right?
Now get back to work - while you still have a job.
